issues.message: Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Damselfly.Core.Models.ConfigSetting>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<Damselfly.Core.Models.ConfigSetting>'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<Damselfly.Core.Models.Image>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.List<Damselfly.Core.Models.Image>'.
